the methods related to transfers and ERC20. v25Tellor.sol and v25TellorGetters.sol reference this library for function's logic.","methods":{"allowance(v25TellorStorage.TellorStorageStruct storage,address,address)":{"params":{"_spender":"address of spender of parties said balance","_user":"address of party with the balance"},"return":"Returns the remaining allowance of tokens granted to the _spender from the _user"},"allowedToTrade(v25TellorStorage.TellorStorageStruct storage,address,uint256)":{"details":"This function returns whether or not a given user is allowed to trade a given amount and removing the staked amount from their balance if they are staked","params":{"_amount":"to check if the user can spend","_user":"address of user"},"return":"true if they are allowed to spend the amount being checked"},"approve(v25TellorStorage.TellorStorageStruct storage,address,uint256)":{"details":"This function approves a _spender an _amount of tokens to use","params":{"_amount":"amount the spender is being approved for","_spender":"address"},"return":"true if spender appproved successfully"},"balanceOf(v25TellorStorage.TellorStorageStruct storage,address)":{"details":"Gets balance of owner specified","params":{"_user":"is the owner address used to look up the balance"},"return":"Returns the balance associated with the passed in _user"},"balanceOfAt(v25TellorStorage.TellorStorageStruct storage,address,uint256)":{"details":"Queries the balance of _user at a specific _blockNumber","params":{"_blockNumber":"The block number when the balance is queried","_user":"The address from which the balance will be retrieved"},"return":"The balance at _blockNumber specified"},"doTransfer(v25TellorStorage.TellorStorageStruct storage,address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Completes POWO transfers by updating the balances on the current block number","params":{"_amount":"to transfer","_from":"address to transfer from","_to":"addres to transfer to"}},"transfer(v25TellorStorage.TellorStorageStruct storage,address,uint256)":{"details":"Allows for a transfer of tokens to _to","params":{"_amount":"The amount of tokens to send","_to":"The address to send tokens to"},"return":"true if transfer is successful"},"transferFrom(v25TellorStorage.TellorStorageStruct storage,address,address,uint256)":{"params":{"_amount":"The amount of tokens to be transferred","_from":"The address holding the tokens being transferred","_to":"The address of the recipient"},"return":"True if the transfer was successful"},"updateBalanceAtNow(v25TellorStorage.Checkpoint[] storage,uint256)":{"details":"Updates balance for from and to on the current block number via doTransfer","params":{"_value":"is the new balance","checkpoints":"gets the mapping for the balances[owner]"}}},"title":"v25Tellor devdoc.details: Contains the methods related to transfers and ERC20. v25Tellor.sol and v25TellorGetters.sol reference this library for function's logic.

params._spender: address of spender of parties said balance
params._user: address of party with the balance

allowance(v25TellorStorage.TellorStorage.return: Returns the remaining allowance of tokens granted to the _spender from the _user

allowedToTrade(v25TellorStorage.TellorSt.details: This function returns whether or not a given user is allowed to trade a given amount and removing the staked amount from their balance if they are staked

params._amount: to check if the user can spend

allowedToTrade(v25TellorStorage.TellorSt.return: true if they are allowed to spend the amount being checked

approve(v25TellorStorage.TellorStorageSt.details: This function approves a _spender an _amount of tokens to use

params._amount: amount the spender is being approved for

params._user: is the owner address used to look up the balance

balanceOf(v25TellorStorage.TellorStorage.return: Returns the balance associated with the passed in _user

balanceOfAt(v25TellorStorage.TellorStora.details: Queries the balance of _user at a specific _blockNumber

params._blockNumber: The block number when the balance is queried
params._user: The address from which the balance will be retrieved

doTransfer(v25TellorStorage.TellorStorag.details: Completes POWO transfers by updating the balances on the current block number

transfer(v25TellorStorage.TellorStorageS.details: Allows for a transfer of tokens to _to

params._amount: The amount of tokens to send
params._to: The address to send tokens to

params._amount: The amount of tokens to be transferred
params._from: The address holding the tokens being transferred

transferFrom(v25TellorStorage.TellorStor.return: True if the transfer was successful

updateBalanceAtNow(v25TellorStorage.Chec.details: Updates balance for from and to on the current block number via doTransfer

params.checkpoints: gets the mapping for the balances[owner]

transferFrom(v25TellorStorage.TellorStor.notice: Send _amount tokens to _to from _from on the condition it is approved by _from
